[{"text": "Bonjour", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062623_c99f5e58ac37.mp3"}, {"text": "Salut", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062624_7c25950c98a4.mp3"}, {"text": "Au revoir", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062624_0ab17d10c9b1.mp3"}, {"text": "Merci", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062624_82a0e5a25fee.mp3"}, {"text": "Oui", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062624_3865b25064b0.mp3"}, {"text": "Non", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062624_00f13de8893d.mp3"}, {"text": "S'il vous plaît", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062624_9375a000080e.mp3"}, {"text": "Comment ça va ?", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062625_a4389a7525fe.mp3"}, {"text": "Ça va.", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062625_8c8ffb1ed266.mp3"}, {"text": "Un", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062625_208a6b5de4d5.mp3"}, {"text": "Deux", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062625_2da29b30e6b0.mp3"}, {"text": "Trois", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062625_347eeb449153.mp3"}]

[{"text": "Le week-end dernier", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062706_5a475dcc065b.mp3"}, {"text": "faire (j'ai fait)", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062706_3b0b45aab1b6.mp3"}, {"text": "aller (je suis allé(e))", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062706_df670a2b0fef.mp3"}, {"text": "voir (j'ai vu)", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062706_5cb996c2d0b7.mp3"}, {"text": "manger (nous avons mangé)", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062707_6a50a71cb103.mp3"}, {"text": "lire (j'ai lu)", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062707_f2b4d9a71e61.mp3"}, {"text": "regarder (j'ai regardé)", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062707_8b08716b07b3.mp3"}, {"text": "rester (je suis resté(e))", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062707_43a6b6e524f6.mp3"}, {"text": "visiter (j'ai visité)", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062707_f54dfc849980.mp3"}, {"text": "chez (chez des amis)", "audio": "https://vocaboo-audio-files.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/audio/20250729_062707_64cf1e64784c.mp3"}]
